description: Numbers that are congruent to {1, 2} mod 5.
comments: This sequence is related to A176059 by a(n) = sum(A176059(i), i=0..n-1) - A176059(n).
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,-1).
formula: a(n) = 5*n-a(n-1)-7 with n>1, a(1)=1. - Vincenzo Librandi, Aug 05 2010G.f. x*(1+x+3*x^2) / ( (1+x)*(x-1)^2 ). - R. J. Mathar, Oct 08 2011a(n) = (10*n-3*(-1)^n-9)/4. - Bruno Berselli, Mar 10 2012
mathematica: Select[Range[0, 200], MemberQ[{1, 2}, Mod[#, 5]] &] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Feb 12 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
